summary: In my role as an OEM Sales Manager at Continental in Dallas, Texas, I work with OEMs in the South USA region, focusing on upselling and prospecting actions for ContiTech products.
highlights: Manage relationships with OEM customers across the South USA, driving upsell and new business for ContiTech product lines.
Develop and execute prospecting strategies tailored to OEM requirements and product lifecycles.
Coordinate cross-functional teams to ensure successful product integration and delivery.

summary: Contributed to strategic sales initiatives by analyzing market trends, developing support materials, and assisting with key account coordination. Provided consultative analysis to internal stakeholders and recommended data-informed strategies to support sales objectives.
highlights: Supported account teams with market analysis and sales enablement collateral.
Collaborated with stakeholders to identify business challenges and recommend data-driven solutions.

summary: Sales Associate Trainee supporting sales operations and learning consultative techniques and internal processes.
highlights: Trained in sales processes and contributed to account coordination.
Demonstrated skills in problem analysis, time management, and creative problem solving.

summary: Supported digital and specialty advertising sales, increased pipeline, and optimized CRM and sales playbooks for new product rollouts.
highlights: Led prospects through the full sales cycle, including closing deals.
Wrote a new sales playbook for product rollout and reorganized CRM to increase efficiency.

summary: Instructor responsible for teaching sailing skills and safety to members and youth programs.
highlights: Delivered instruction and supervised sailing programs for adults and youth.
Developed leadership and supervisory skills through program coordination.

summary: Taught basic and intermediate tennis skills to children aged 6–14, organized sessions, and managed program logistics.
highlights: Planned and executed age-appropriate lesson plans for youth athletes.
Built communication and team leadership skills through coaching.

summary: Organized and led summer camp programs for children, including sports and activities.
highlights: Managed groups of children aged 7–12 and taught basic tennis skills.

summary: Organized setup, teardown and staff for special events and community meals.
highlights: Coordinated volunteers and managed event logistics.

summary: Operated audio and video systems for services and events.
highlights: Managed AV setups for weekly services and special events.

summary: Packaged precision components used in autonomous vehicle optics.
highlights: Maintained quality control and throughput on the production line.

summary: Built custom trade show displays and supported production tasks.
highlights: Worked on custom fabrication and assembly for client installations.
